transArray.content: The quilt in the room is very comfortable, the mattress is very soft, the water temperature of the shower head is very suitable, and the water flow is very fast. The wireless network speed experience is also very good, the network speed is very fast! The front desk service is great! They also thoughtfully prepared a quiet room for me with good soundproofing. I was very satisfied with my one-night stay!
Dear guest, thank you very much for choosing me. You are not a dim star, but the entire galaxy that encompasses the bright moon. I love you, little man.
